XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for Moodle local bigdata config

FIELD.NAME: courses
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma separated values with the courses to export, empty = all

FIELD.NAME: roles
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma separated values with the roles to export. empty = all

FIELD.NAME: excludedusers
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma separated values with the users to exclude form the export.

FIELD.NAME: tablefields
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma separated values with the tables and fields to export. Empty = default selection

FIELD.NAME: periodicity
FIELD.COMMENT: Periodicity for the cron execution. Empty means never
